edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.hadoopinterface
Class CuratorReducer

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Reducer<Text,HadoopRecord,Text,HadoopRecord>
      edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.hadoopinterface.CuratorReducer

public class CuratorReducer
extends Reducer<Text,HadoopRecord,Text,HadoopRecord>

A Reducer that serves as a wrapper for the document annotation tool. It handles creating a locally-running Curator, launching and calling the annotation tool, and so on. After running the annotation tool, new annotation will be written to HDFS.

Method Detail

reduce

public void reduce(Text inKey,
                   Iterable<HadoopRecord> inValues,
                   Reducer.Context context)
            throws IOException,
                   InterruptedException
Asks the Curator to get an annotation (the type of which is specified in the context's configuration) for the document record in inValue.

Overrides:
reduce in class Reducer<Text,HadoopRecord,Text,HadoopRecord>
Parameters:
inKey - The document's hash
inValues - The record(s) for the document(s), which include both the original text file and the known annotations.
context - The job context
Throws:
IOException - Since reduce() is contractually obligated to throw only IOExceptions and InterruptedExceptions, we're forced to abuse the semantics here. IOExceptions can be thrown if we cannot launch the Curator or an annotator, if we fail to annotate the document correctly, and so on.
InterruptedException

launchCuratorIfNecessary

public void launchCuratorIfNecessary(AnnotationMode toolToRun)
                              throws IOException,
                                     InterruptedException,
                                     TException
Checks to see if the Curator is running on the local node. If it is not, it will launch it and wait to return until it confirms the Curator has successfully started.

Parameters:
toolToRun - The annotation tool that the Curator should be configured to communicate with
Throws:
IOException - If, after many attempts, we are unable to launch the Curator.
InterruptedException - If sleeping the thread fails
TException

launchAnnotatorIfNecessary

public void launchAnnotatorIfNecessary(AnnotationMode toolToRun)
                                throws IOException,
                                       InterruptedException,
                                       TException
Checks to see if the indicated annotation tool is running already. If it is not, it will launch it and wait to return until it confirms the tool has successfully started.

Parameters:
toolToRun - The annotation tool to launch
Throws:
IOException - If, after many attempts, we are unable to launch the annotation tool.
InterruptedException - If sleeping the thread fails
TException

setToolHasBeenLaunched

public static void setToolHasBeenLaunched(boolean newValue)
                                   throws IOException
Sets or unsets the flag in the file system which is used to indicate that an annotation tool is running on this Reduce node.

Parameters:
newValue - True if the flag should indicate that there is indeed an annotator which needs to be shut down later, or false if it should indicate there are no more running annotators.
Throws:
IOException - If the flag in the file system cannot be set
